talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Ha. Ha. Ha. I am Adventurer David! I am the proud slave of Argenta , the most beautiful and delicate being in the world!
... What is it? I don't have anything to say to you right now!

$Argenta$
I don't think you should be here right now.
Don't bother me. Go and do what you must do.

$Elite Soldier$
I'm sorry, but I'm a little busy right now. I have to write apologies letter because of what happened at Calderock. *Sigh*...
Oh and I just remembered that the Bishop was looking for you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes. She has always been chasing the Black Knight.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
Is there really somebody who knows the whereabouts of the Black Knight?
Is this true?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Her name is Argenta.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
If you are talking about a woman, then you must be talking about that Silver-Haired Swordswoman who helped you at Calderock Village. Yes, what was her name?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But Argenta and I separated right when we arrived at the Royal Castle, so there is no way of knowing where she is at.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio${action:talk}
Argenta...? Hehe. That's quite an interesting name...
Hmm... Right. If she was chasing the Black Knight, she might know something.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes, I will try that.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
We urgently need her help right now, so we must do what we can do to find her...
How about asking Elite Soldier, who came with you? If Argenta left the Royal Castle, the soldiers would have seen her.

$Bishop Ignacio$
I will speak to the King and the ministers and try to get at least some soldiers for support. Meanwhile, go and find Argenta.

$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Ha. Ha. Ha. I am Adventurer David! I am the proud slave of Argenta , the most beautiful and delicate being in the world!
... What is it? I don't have anything to say to you right now!

$Argenta$
I don't think you should be here right now.
Don't bother me. Go and do what you must do.

$Elite Soldier$
I'm sorry, but I'm a little busy right now. I have to submit one hundred written letters of apologies because of what happened at Calderock. *Sigh*...

$Bishop Ignacio$
Did you find out?
Soldier is a very faithful friend, so he will let you know if he has any information.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Do you know where she went?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Elite Soldier${action:talk}
Oh, it's you, {user_nick}.
If you're talking about Argenta, are you talking about the lady that was on board the airship with you? Of course I remember her.
You can't see such a beautiful lady like her these days.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh, are you talking about Adventurer David?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Elite Soldier$
She didn't really mention anything about her destination, but... Her other companion might know.
I'm talking about that person named Dav... or whatever.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I see.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Elite Soldier$
Yes. He came over to me and whispered a question about how dangerous Foothills of Black Mountain is.
After I explained the region he asked about, his face suddenly hardened, and then he left.

$Elite Soldier$
I think you might want to go and check Foothills of Black Mountain . If I am remembering correctly, that Adventurer David fellow should have gone in that direction.

$Elite Soldier$
I have no idea where did Argenta went, but I if I am not wrong, Adventurer David should have headed to Foothills of Black Mountain .

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>... Where is Argenta?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
It's been a long time, {user_nick}!!
Did you come here to meet the great Adventurer David? Ha. Ha. Ha.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Are you saying that she abandoned you, and left alone?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Argenta? She was here just a minute ago!
But then she suddenly ran away!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>So do you know where she went?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
What? A...Abandon? Take a look at this Proof of Slave that Argenta herself, has given to me?
(Adventurer David shows the Proof of Slave as if he is bragging.)
I'm certain that something urgent has come up for her!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Abandoned Welton Hollow? ...Okay.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Abandoned Welton Hollow!
I was keeping tap on her with my keen pair of eye and I am sure that she head toward there! I didn't follow but not because I was scared !

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Do whatever you want.. I not gona help you with such a simple task</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Hey! I have to prepare a meal for ArgentaHmm give me some ideas what would be good for her. Since previously you was her slave but you lose out to me

$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Oh, how imprudent! How could you call Argenta's meal petty?!
Well anyway... If you happen to meet Argenta, tell her that this weak Adventurer David will be patiently waiting at Foothills of Black Mountain !

$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
You still haven't left? Argenta headed towards Abandoned Welton Hollow at an amazing speed.
Hurry up and meet Argenta!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Humpf GeraintI could sense Geraint presence, but where did he go? Did you lose him?
(Argenta has a serious face.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Argenta, do you know where the Black Knight is?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
What? Why are you still lurking around here?
You said you were going to Royal Castle to make a report, but you must have some free time on your hands, is that so?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then is there any way to find out where he went?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
The Black Knight? He was already gone when I arrived.
Should have run away like a coward.
All that is left is his scent.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>His Fortress would be...?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Since he got nothing important here, and he already gotten thepower of the Ancients into his hands, he should be hiding himself in theFortress.
He should have being defeated..

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I will follow you after I reported to the Royal Castle</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Where else would it be besides the Dark Overlord's Keep?
Well anyway, I'm going to go chase that guy.With your skill, you would easily die. But i wouldn't stop you if you insist on following

$Argenta$
Royal Castle? A report?
You guys don't change.
Well, whatever.

$Argenta$
I'm going to head towards the Dark Overlord Keep.
You said you were going to report to the Royal Castle, right? Well, do as you would like.

$Argenta's Slave Adventurer David$
Argenta is going to the Dark Overlord Keep?
T-then, I guess I should just patiently wait right here!
I-I'm not staying because I'm scared or anything like that!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>She mention that he had head toward Dark Overlord Keep</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
Oh, your back after meeting Argenta
Well, does she know where the Black Knight is at?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The Prophet should also be there...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
Oh no... This is not good.
Isn't the Bdark Overlord Keep filled with powerful monsters?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Ignacio looks at you with sorrowful eyes.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
Your right, we need to target the Dark Overlord Keep to find the Prophet.
However we do not have enough troop to dispatch..

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Aren't there any Royal Castle Guards or Elite Soldiers?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
The Templar Knights did not return after they were dispatch to Mana Ridge and Cardelock Even if they return, they can't provide too much help, as it will take time to organize the troops.
As for the Sorceresses, we cant expect much, they are an uncooperative group.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
The Guards cannot just make a move without the approval of the Duke. The Duke don't any how release his troops as they are also required to protect the King and possible rebellions. Thus i think our best bet now is to make use of Royal Castle's Elite Soldiers

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#a94407>(Receive Reward)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: Bishop Ignacio's Suggestion
journal.contents:
It looks like Bishop Ignacio has something to say about Argenta.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio

journal.title: The Investigations of Argenta's Whereabouts I
journal.contents:
You must find the whereabouts of the Black Knight by asking Argenta. Elite Soldier, should know where Argenta location is

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Elite Soldier
journal.todo_msg: Enquire Elite Soldier where Argenta went.

journal.title: The Investigations of Argenta's Whereabouts II
journal.contents:
It looks like Adventurer David, who came with Argenta, has headed towards Foothills of Black Mountain . Find Adventurer David.

Foothills of Black Mountain → Adventurer David
journal.destination: Talk to Adventurer David at Foothills of Black Mountain
journal.todo_msg: Meet Adventurer David at Foothills of Black Mountain, and ask about Argenta's whereabouts.

journal.title: The Investigations of Argenta's Whereabouts III
journal.contents:
According to Adventurer David, Argenta ran towards Abandoned Welton Hollow.

Foothills of Black Mountain (Deserted Woods Patch) → Abandoned Welton Hollow
journal.destination: Talk to Argenta at Abandoned Welton Hollow
journal.todo_msg: Find Argenta at Abandoned Welton Hollow and talk to her.

journal.title: Report to the Bishop
journal.contents:
It seems like the Black Knight has already returned to the Dark Overlord's Keep. Report what you have heard from Bishop Ignacio.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio
journal.todo_msg: Tell Bishop Ignacio where the Black Knight is at.
